example.code:
Amazon.S3.Model.S3AccessControlList = Get-S3ACL -BucketName 's3casetestbucket' -Key 'Listec2instances.ps1' Amazon.S3.Model.S3AccessControlList.Owner
DisplayName Id ----------- -- testusername 9988776a6554433d22f1100112e334acb45566778899009e9887bd7f66c5f544
Amazon.S3.Model.S3AccessControlList.Grants
Grantee Permission ------- ---------- Amazon.S3.Model.S3Grantee FULL_CONTROL Amazon.S3.Model.S3Grantee READ Amazon.S3.Model.S3Grantee READ_ACP Amazon.S3.Model.S3Grantee READ Amazon.S3.Model.S3Grantee READ_ACP
example.description: This command gets the details of the object owner and the permissions granted on the S3 object.
